name: Marvin Ludersdorfer
body:
![Me](https://github.com/lude-ma/lude-ma.github.io/lude-ma.jpg)

I am a mechanical engineer and roboticist.
I like to build things and see how they develop---from first ideas to working prototypes.

Currently I work at [fortiss](http://www.fortiss.org) and pursue a doctorate at the [Technische Universität München](https://www.tum.de) as part of the [biomimetic robotics and machine learning](https://brml.org/brml/) laboratory.

In my spare time I enjoy hiking, reading, cooking and dancing salsa and bachata.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
